name: COALITION FOR 1099-K FAIRNESS
description: Coalition of online marketplaces and digital payment companies.
sampleDescriptions: Strategic and policy advice with respect to Section 9674 of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 (Pub L. No. 117-2), Cut Red Tape for Online Sales Act (H.R.7079 and S.3840), SNOOP Act of 2022 (S.3546 and H.R.6913), Saving Gig Economy Taxpayers Act (H.R.3425), and S.948 - A bill to protect American small businesses, gig workers, and freelancers by repealing the burdensome American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 transactions reporting threshold.

Strategic and policy advice with respect to Section 9674 of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 (P.L. 117-2), Cut Red Tape for Online Sales Act (H.R. 7079 and S. 3840), SNOOP Act of 2022 (S. 3546 and H.R. 6913), Saving Gig Economy Taxpayers Act (H.R. 3425), and S. 948 - A bill to protect American small businesses, gig workers, and freelancers by repealing the burdensome American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 transactions reporting threshold.

Strategic and policy advice with respect to Section 9674 of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 (P.L. 117-2), Cut Red Tape for Online Sales Act (H.R. 7079 and S. 3840), SNOOP Act of 2022 (S. 3546 and H.R. 6913), Saving Gig Economy Taxpayers Act (H.R. 3425), S. 5291 and H.R. 9611 - A bill to delay the implementation of the modifications of exceptions for reporting of third party network transactions.

Strategic and policy advice with respect to amending Section 9674 of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 (P.L. 117-2); H.R. 190 - Saving Gig Economy Taxpayers Act; S. 26/H.R. 488 - SNOOP Act of 2023; H.R. 3530 - Cut Red Tape For Online Sales Act; S. 1761 - Red Tape Reduction Act of 2023; H.R. 3937 - Small Business Jobs Act; and S. 948 - A bill to protect American small businesses, gig workers, and freelancers by repealing the burdensome American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 transactions reporting threshold.

Strategic and policy advice with respect to amending Section 9674 of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 (P.L. 117-2); H.R. 190 - Saving Gig Economy Taxpayers Act; H.R 488/ S. 26 - SNOOP Act of 2023; H.R. 3530 - Cut Red Tape For Online Sales Act; S. 1761 - Red Tape Reduction Act of 2023; H.R. 3937 - Small Business Jobs Act; and S. 948 - A bill to protect American small businesses, gig workers, and freelancers by repealing the burdensome American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 transactions reporting threshold (2021-2022).

Issues related to Section 9674 of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 (P.L. 117-2); H.R. 3425 - Saving Gig Economy Taxpayers Act; H.R. 6913/ S.3546 - SNOOP Act of 2022; H.R. 7079/S. 3840- Cut Red Tape for Online Sales Act; and S. 948 - A bill to protect American small businesses, gig workers, and freelancers by repealing the burdensome American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 transactions reporting threshold.
